conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
book_2 contains tables such as book.
Table book has columns such as book_id, title, issues, writer.
conversations.query: What are the titles of the books whose writer is not "Elaine Lee"?
conversations.answer: select title from book where writer != 'elaine lee';
